RecoveryMethodPage.title: How do you want to back up your account?

firstOption.title: Offline, using recovery phrase
firstOption.subtitle: A 24 word phrase will be generated. We highly recommend you to write these words down on paper and store them in a safe offline place.

SecondOption.title: Digitally, using private key
SecondOption.subtitle: Your CoreID account can be recovered with a private key which you will have to protect with a password and store.
